statements: UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 1000.00 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transaction_history SET sender_wallet_address = 'sender123@example.com', receiver_wallet_address = 'receiver456@example.com' WHERE transaction_timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00';
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 'c792ea94-8c17-45e4-86d2-903c6827d1b1';

UPDATE transaction_history SET sender_wallet_address = 'xyz123' , receiver_wallet_address = 'abc456' , transaction_timestamp = '2023-09-20 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 'a23456bc-7852-43d5-89ab-f34c5ee2a120';
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 5000.00 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = balance - 1000.00 WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = balance - 50 WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 100.50 WHERE account_id = '234e5678-a678-12d3-b567-426614174100';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00, timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:00:00' WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 1000.00, account_name = 'Savings Account' WHERE account_id = '987e6543-21c3-4a56-b89a-741742614426';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET public_key = 'new_public_key' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00, timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE balances SET balance = balance + 1000.00 WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 100 WHERE account_id = 1234;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500, transaction_date = '2022-09-15 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 9876;
UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance - 1000 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500, sender_address = '1234 ABC Street' WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
